verses.text: O \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w God|strong="H0430"\w* of my \w salvation|strong="H3444"\w*, I have \w cried|strong="H6817"\w* \w day|strong="H3117"\w* \add and\add* \w night|strong="H3915"\w* before thee:\f + \fr 88.1 \ft for the sons: or, of the sons\f*\f + \fr 88.1 \ft Maschilâ€¦: or, A Psalm of Heman the Ezrahite, giving instruction\f*
Let my \w prayer|strong="H8605"\w* \w come|strong="H0935"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* thee: \w incline|strong="H5186"\w* thine \w ear|strong="H0241"\w* unto my \w cry|strong="H7440"\w*;
For my \w soul|strong="H5315"\w* is \w full|strong="H7646"\w* of \w troubles|strong="H7451"\w*: and my \w life|strong="H2416"\w* draweth \w nigh|strong="H5060"\w* unto the \w grave|strong="H7585"\w*.

I am \w counted|strong="H2803"\w* with them that go \w down|strong="H3381"\w* into the \w pit|strong="H0953"\w*: I am as a \w man|strong="H1397"\w* \add that hath\add* no \w strength|strong="H0353"\w*:

\w Free|strong="H2670"\w* among the \w dead|strong="H4191"\w*, like the \w slain|strong="H2491"\w* that \w lie|strong="H7901"\w* in the \w grave|strong="H6913"\w*, whom thou \w rememberest|strong="H2142"\w* no more: and they are cut \w off|strong="H1504"\w* from thy \w hand|strong="H3027"\w*.\f + \fr 88.5 \ft from: or, by\f*
Thou hast \w laid|strong="H7896"\w* me in the \w lowest|strong="H8482"\w* \w pit|strong="H0953"\w*, in \w darkness|strong="H4285"\w*, in the \w deeps|strong="H4688"\w*.
Thy \w wrath|strong="H2534"\w* lieth \w hard|strong="H5564"\w* upon me, and thou hast \w afflicted|strong="H6031"\w* \add me\add* with all thy \w waves|strong="H4867"\w*. \w Selah|strong="H5542"\w*.

Thou hast put \w away|strong="H7368"\w* mine \w acquaintance|strong="H3045"\w* \w far|strong="H7368"\w* from me; thou hast \w made|strong="H7896"\w* me an \w abomination|strong="H8441"\w* unto them: \add I am\add* shut \w up|strong="H3607"\w*, and I cannot come \w forth|strong="H3318"\w*.

Mine \w eye|strong="H5869"\w* \w mourneth|strong="H1669"\w* by reason of \w affliction|strong="H6040"\w*: \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, I have \w called|strong="H7121"\w* \w daily|strong="H3117"\w* upon thee, I have stretched \w out|strong="H7849"\w* my \w hands|strong="H3709"\w* unto thee.

Wilt thou \w shew|strong="H6213"\w* \w wonders|strong="H6382"\w* to the \w dead|strong="H4191"\w*? shall the \w dead|strong="H7496"\w* \w arise|strong="H6965"\w* \add and\add* \w praise|strong="H3034"\w* thee? \w Selah|strong="H5542"\w*.

Shall thy \w lovingkindness|strong="H2617"\w* be \w declared|strong="H5608"\w* in the \w grave|strong="H6913"\w*? \add or\add* thy \w faithfulness|strong="H0530"\w* in \w destruction|strong="H0011"\w*?

Shall thy \w wonders|strong="H6382"\w* be \w known|strong="H3045"\w* in the \w dark|strong="H2822"\w*? and thy \w righteousness|strong="H6666"\w* in the \w land|strong="H0776"\w* of \w forgetfulness|strong="H5388"\w*?
But unto thee have I \w cried|strong="H7768"\w*, O \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*; and in the \w morning|strong="H1242"\w* shall my \w prayer|strong="H8605"\w* \w prevent|strong="H6923"\w* thee.
\nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, why castest thou \w off|strong="H2186"\w* my \w soul|strong="H5315"\w*? \add why\add* \w hidest|strong="H5641"\w* thou thy \w face|strong="H6440"\w* from me?

I \add am\add* \w afflicted|strong="H6041"\w* and ready to \w die|strong="H1478"\w* from \add my\add* \w youth|strong="H5290"\w* up: \add while\add* I \w suffer|strong="H5375"\w* thy \w terrors|strong="H0367"\w* I am \w distracted|strong="H6323"\w*.
Thy fierce \w wrath|strong="H2740"\w* goeth \w over|strong="H5674"\w* me; thy \w terrors|strong="H1161"\w* have cut me \w off|strong="H6789"\w*.

They came round \w about|strong="H5437"\w* me \w daily|strong="H3117"\w* like \w water|strong="H4325"\w*; they \w compassed|strong="H5362"\w* me about \w together|strong="H3162"\w*.\f + \fr 88.17 \ft daily: or, all the day\f*
\w Lover|strong="H0157"\w* and \w friend|strong="H7453"\w* hast thou put \w far|strong="H7368"\w* from me, \add and\add* mine \w acquaintance|strong="H3045"\w* into \w darkness|strong="H4285"\w*.
